translations: 拆开；去膜；加条纹；条纹图案
给……加条纹（strip 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Server striping and mirroring for extreme scalability
sentences.translation: 服务器striping和极端扩展的镜像

sentences.sentence: In fact, MooTools provides an even better way of performing row striping.
sentences.translation: 实际上，MooTools提供了实现表行条状化(row striping)的更好方法。
